member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Data.RecordManager
member.summary: The RecordManager class is the entry point for all data related operations. It takes care of sorting and grouping records as well as managing add/delete/edit operations that affect the sort or group structure. The class manages a tabular record set and provides links to other tables when dealing with hierarchy.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RecordManager.GetDistinctValues(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the distinct values for the filed with the given name. These are used in distinct filtering.
member.param: The name of the field.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RecordManager.AddNewRecord(System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds the new record. The method takes into account the sort and group definitions to add the record to the correct group and position it at the right index.
member.param: The record data item.
The data source index at which the new record will be created. Note that this index does not correspond to the index in the records collection when having grouping or sorging.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RecordManager.DeleteRecord(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the record at the specified data source index. The method will locate the record at that data source index and delete it from the records. The operation will affect any groups containing the record and will delete groups that become empty.
member.param: The data source index.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RecordManager.UpdateRecord(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the record at the specified data source index. Whenever a data item gets modified it may need to be moved to another group if grouping is defined.
member.param: The data source index.
The name of the field used to update the distinct values used in filtering.
member.remarks: If the data source supports change notifications (INotifyCollectionChanged or IBindingList data sources) updating a record will be handled automatically by the grid. When binding to a data source that does not support change notifications, you are responsible of calling this method whenever a data item changes.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Data.RecordManager.MoveRecord(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the record. This method changes the order records are displayed by the grid. It will have effect only when no sorting has been defined.
member.remarks: If the data source supports change notifications (INotifyCollectionChanged or IBindingList data sources) moving a record will be handled automatically by the grid. When binding to a data source that does not support change notifications, you are responsible of calling this method whenever a data item changes.
member.param: From data source index.
To data source index.

member.summary: Finds a record by its data item.
member.param: The data item.
member.returns: A Record instance.
